result.execSummary:
All charges against Aaron Lewis Kobs in this case have been dismissed. These charges were not proven and have no legal effect. Aaron Lewis Kobs is presumed innocent.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.
result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Aaron Lewis Kobs

10:43 AM Apprs: CO: S. Needham, Rpr: V. Kasten, Clerk: Christianson.  Prosecuting attorney Holly Elkin Rockow in court for the State of Wisconsin. Attorney Nicholas Von Davis in court for Aaron Lewis Kobs. Defendant Aaron Lewis Kobs in court, in custody. Includes 22CM12, 22CM34, 22CM115, 22CM492 and 22CM493. Court reviews case. Atty Davis requests all cases to be resolved today. Court reads charge and maximum penalty. DE pleads Guilty to Count 1: Battery WITH enhancer- 940.19(1) in 22CM492 and Guilty to Count 1: Misdemeanor Bail Jumping- 94649(1)(a) in 22CM115. DE sworn. Crt reviews plea questionnaire and informs DE of rights. Crt finds DE freely, voluntarily and knowingly waives rights and makes plea. Attorney's stipulate to the facts. Crt accepts plea, finds factual basis and finds DE guilty to Count 1 in 22CM492 and Count 1 in 22CM115. On motion of the State without objection, Crt dismisses Cts 2-5 in 22CM492, Ct 2 in 22CM115, 22CM12, 22CM34, and 22CM493. Sentencing arguments. Court removes JT. 

Court Orders:

22CM492 Count 1: 60 days jail. to commence today. Concurrent with 22CM115 Count 1. 29 days credit

- Court Costs: $243.00. Apply Bond. 
- DNA Sample and Surcharge: $200.00. Apply Bond. 

22CM115 Count 1: 60 days jail. to commence today. Concurrent with22CM492 Count 1. 29 days credit

- Court Costs: $243.00. Apply Bond. Apply Bond. B
- DNA Sample and Surcharge: $200.00. Apply Bond. 

All court obligations are to be converted to civil judgement. 

Adjourned at11:12 AM
Bail/bond hearing on September 14, 2022 at 02:45 pm.

records.addlTxt:
Includes 22CM492 and 22CM493.

It is hereby ordered, as a condition of the defendant's bond/bail in the above-captioned case, that he/she have absolutely NO CONTACT whatsoever with the complaining witness, or with any of the following named persons and/or locations, Kristi D.  The term "no contact" is hereby defined as no contact in person, by telephone, by way of electronic device, email, facsimile, social media including but not limited to texting, Facebook, Twitter, contact through the mail, and/or through a third person.  The aforementioned condition of bond/bail is set pursuant to Sec. 969.02(3)(d), Wis Stats.

Defendant may retrieve personal belongings from the residence in the presence of law enforcement ONLY. 

If the defendant fails to comply with the conditions of his/her bond/bail that he/she may be charged with the offense of bail jumping.
Status conference on August 23, 2022 at 10:15 am.

1:19 PM CO: RMW , REP: Melstrom, CLERK: Lindabaur. CO: RMW, REP: Melstrom, CLERK: Lindabaur. Prosecuting attorney Holly Elkin Rockow in court for the State of Wisconsin.  Attorney Abrianna Dolfi in court for Defendant for today. Defendant Aaron Lewis Kobs appeared by video, in custody. Includes 22CM492 and 22CM493. DE updates address and confirms DOB. DE understands charges and possible penalties. DE doesn't qualify for PD-PFAC given. PO hold. Bond argument. Court orders bond. Court enters NG pleas. Preserve pre-plea rights. Court sets STC to check status of counsel. Adjourned at 1:24 PM.  gll
